title: JsonRpc DNX Router
description: A DNX IRouter implementation for Json Rpc v2 requests for Microsoft.AspNet.Routing.
summary: A DNX Json RPC v2 router
releaseNotes: First 'stable' beta release for beta6 dnx, marking a release. Added enforcing id to be string, number or null. Enforcing user to configure one route in the configuration. Now compatable with complex objects/lists as parameters.
